apps.name: v 1.2.10 Release (Streamer-iOS.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
- Fixes StreamingCommunity URL 
- Add olgply.com as a backup source for all movies and tv-shows 
- Fixes battery issues when playing videos for a long time https://github.com/StreamerApp/Streamer/issues/63
- Don't like ads? now when you donate to Streamer through https://buymeacoffee.com/streamerapp.  we will send you an email with a code to disable the ads in the app  ðŸŽ‰



**Resolver core engine is now open source.ðŸŽ‰**
Are you a developer? want to add your favourite website to Streamer? check out https://github.com/StreamerApp/Resolver

- Don't like ads? now when you donate to Streamer through https://buymeacoffee.com/streamerapp.  we will send you an email with a code to disable the ads in the app  ðŸŽ‰

Are you a developer? want to add your favourite website to Streamer? check out https://github.com/StreamerApp/Resolver

apps.name: v 1.2.9 Release (Streamer-iOS.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
- ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹  Fixed StreamingCommunity search and viewing shows.
- ðŸ‡©ðŸ‡ª HDFilme went down. so I removed HDFilme and added kinokiste.club
- ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸ fixed playing issues for pelisflix
- ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ Added Fmovies.to
- Fixed a lot of issues for different hosts like VizCloud, StreamSB, VidSrc, Nupload

Built using iOS 16 SDK

apps.name: v 1.2.8 Release (Streamer-iOS-16.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
- Add a new Italian provider ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹ StreamingCommunity
- Fixed VizCloud. VidStreaming, RabbitStreaming, and l lot more. You should see more sources to choose from for flixtor and 123movies.
- Fixes some performance issues

apps.name: v 1.2.7 Release (Streamer-iOS-16.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
- Fixes for Flixtor, TVshows88, Sflix.pro and Akwam
- New Anime provider Zoro
- Fixes displaying Spanish characters in subtitles issue 
- Fix crashs and small UI improvements for iOS 14
- Removed a lot of unused code and SDKs. The app should be smaller than the previous versions. 
- I notice a lot of new users coming from SA ðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡¦ , so Streamer is now in RTL Arabic interface Ø³ØªØ±ÙŠÙ…Ø± Ø¨ÙŠØªÙƒÙ„Ù… Ø¹Ø±Ø¨ÙŠ Ø§Ù„Ø§Ù†

apps.name: v1.2.6 Release (Streamer-iOS-16.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
- Fixes for Flixtor, TVshows88, Sflix.pro, HDfilme and MediaBoxHD
- Added backup streams to all providers. so now you should see more options to stream from
- Added option to delete all favourites and continue watching section. if you have issues opening some content from favourites or continue watching section please use the buttons in the settings screen to clear them all.

apps.name: v1.2.5 Release (Streamer-iOS-16.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
- Added a new Mediabox provider that gets its data from MediaBoxHD.net app. it will be used as a fallback for all providers in case we didn't find working links for any movie or tv show 
- Fixes Spanish providers
- Moved the search screen entry point to the home screen
- New fancy provider selection screen
- A lot of small bug fixes and improvements for parsing video files

Join our new discord server https://discord.gg/XhZwzuwKPM
You can find the link in the settings screen

![Simulator Screen Shot - iPhone 13 - 2022-07-09 at 11 08 45](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/96978272/178099450-5186eb20-ea12-4247-b172-a4021228a5af.png)

![Simulator Screen Shot - iPhone 13 - 2022-07-09 at 11 12 44](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/96978272/178099595-462778dc-877f-427d-827a-9a5538c13f05.png)

apps.name: v1.2.4 Release (Streamer-iOS-16.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
- Share button: now you can share all movies and tv shows with your Streamer friends. Links will open directly in the app
- Add new subtitles options for font and opacity. https://github.com/StreamerApp/Streamer/issues/47
- UI fixes for Movies and TVShows details screen
- Fix continue watching order on the Home Screen 
- Add a link to support Streamer development in the settings screen https://www.buymeacoffee.com/streamerapp
- iOS 16 builds were built using Xcode 14 beta 2.

apps.name: v1.2.3 Release (Streamer-iOS-16.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
- Fixes crashing Home Screen screen in some cases if the home page is not loaded correctly https://github.com/StreamerApp/Streamer/issues/49
- Fixes VideoVard video host crash if video not found
- Added Sflix.pro and TVshows88.com sources if Flixtor.video not working in your country.
- Fixes OpenSubtitles downloading on AppleTV
- Build .deb files for iOS and tvOS 
- Added signed iOS app using an enterprise certificate

apps.name: v1.2.2 Release (Streamer-iOS-16.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
- Disable the ad that appears when the app opens. now it will only show one ad per session when you enter the details screen.
- Fixes #44
- Hopefully fixes #40
- Fixes a crash in the Home Screen related to continue watching feature.
- Added user ID in the settings screen so I can track bugs more efficiently. please attach your userID when reporting bugs
- Â

apps.name: v1.2.1 Release (Streamer-iOS-16.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
- New home screen to show trending movies and shows
- **Continue watching**: now you can see what you are watching and continue watching from where you left 
- **iOS**: Settings screen was moved to home screen navigation bar on top
- **tvOS**: now you can change the source just by tapping the play button on the home, movies and tv shows screen
- Fixes **Peliculasgo** Spanish source and remove **Pelisflix.**one and **SeriesYonkis.io**. they were super slow and have a lot of issues 
- Fixes picture-in-picture functionality for iPad https://github.com/StreamerApp/Streamer/issues/43
- Fixes favorite functionality
![Simulator Screen Shot - iPhone 13 - 2022-06-17 at 19 46 53](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/96978272/174351766-f1cc1429-399f-4616-82e8-26fc5071dae6.png)
![Simulator Screen Shot - iPhone 13 - 2022-06-17 at 19 46 38](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/96978272/174351796-66ce7342-d410-4642-ae56-c5b068b84cf2.png)
![Simulator Screen Shot - iPhone 13 - 2022-06-17 at 19 46 32](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/96978272/174351800-5151eca7-b7d0-444a-bf4e-7d6e9696fb0b.png)
![Simulator Screen Shot - iPhone 13 - 2022-06-17 at 19 46 18](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/96978272/174351823-ad96bffd-b893-4bfd-99bf-3cbed7ae8f48.png)
![Simulator Screen Shot - Apple TV 4K (2nd generation) - 2022-06-17 at 19 45 21](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/96978272/174351838-35cfc280-65e1-4652-b460-bf76d39a6a39.png)
![Simulator Screen Shot - Apple TV 4K (2nd generation) - 2022-06-17 at 19 45 03](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/96978272/174351895-5a161d05-555b-401c-aed4-a53cce7fd6fb.png)

apps.name: v1.1.8 Release (Streamer-iOS-16.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
- Add OpenSubtitles to download subtitles for movies and tv shows. all you have to do is to add your username and password in the settings screen and make sure you selected a language. 
- Add a toggle button to enable/disable showing subtitles in case you don't want to show subtitles at all.
- Fix showing ads: due to a bug in the implementation the app was showing ads every couple of secs. now it will only show one ad at the app start to support the development server.
- add iOS 16 beta builds for people with beta software

apps.name: v1.1.5 Release (Streamer-iOS.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
- Add rating for movies and tv shows
- Adds Source selection button from the movies and tv shows listing screen
- Fixes Vidcloud host. Flixtor and 9anime sources should have more options now to stream from
- Allow to connect to sources even if ISP blocks them tying to fix https://github.com/StreamerApp/Streamer/issues/26
- Fixes some UI issues for iOS 14 and iPad
- Various bug fixes and improvements
![Simulator Screen Shot - iPhone 13 - 2022-05-26 at 21 06 26](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/96978272/170562785-d6832ca6-082a-437a-a5af-2e9e20f493ab.png)

apps.name: v1.1.3 Release (Streamer-iOS.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
- **Add manual source selection:** users can choose "manual" from the preferred quality setting in the settings screen to be able to choose which source to use to play the content
- Add season selection for tvOS 
- Fix iPad crashing when tapping on the select season button
- Fix iPad settings screen not showing in portrait orientation  
- Updates to HDFilm, Flixtor, and CimaNow hosts to make them more stable

apps.name: 1.1.0 (Streamer-iOS.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
- Revamp all screens in the app
- Better integration with themoviedb.org for more information about Movies, shows, and episodes
- Add subtitles support for iOS 
- Add subtitles settings like font color, size, and language
- Add new Source HDFilme.cx for German movies and shows with streaming quality 1080

apps.name: v1.0.5 Release (Streamer-iOS.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
- Fix 123movies URL loading for "Vidembed.me" domain caused an error when trying to play any new TV show or movie. 
- Add new sources in the settings of the app for AppleTV and iOS. Make sure to restart the app after changing the selection
  - **Flixtor.video**: Not updated regularly like 123movies but provide better quality and contains many subtitles for different languages. Chromecast support is not working for now for this provider.
  - **Yesmovies.ag**: This provider is updated regularly and has some 1080p movies, but it doesn't have any subtitles. Search is not working for now as there is DDoS protection. 
  - **Akwam.io**: Arabic experimental provider for my pleasure
- New Subtitle selector for tvOS. Try it out with Flixtor provider 
- Fix backdrop image for movies and TvShows 
- Remove Topshelf support for tvOS as it was causing trouble in certificate signing.
![Simulator Screen Shot - iPhone 13 - 2022-01-16 at 22 45 08](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/96978272/149679309-4973bce9-935a-42ea-8a48-a93b99453403.png)
![Simulator Screen Shot - iPhone 13 - 2022-01-16 at 22 09 21](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/96978272/149679311-56347d3f-8812-4f54-9548-4c626bd0100e.png)
![Simulator Screen Shot - Apple TV - 2022-01-16 at 22 11 21](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/96978272/149679315-86ea1183-6d05-4d8f-a610-42f78172ad2e.png)
![Simulator Screen Shot - Apple TV - 2022-01-16 at 22 10 34](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/96978272/149679318-5bb9a4cd-59c3-4ec6-bc73-158db4ea4a5c.png)
![Simulator Screen Shot - Apple TV - 2022-01-16 at 22 10 12](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/96978272/149679325-7014fedc-d36e-455e-b1f7-07f825b43a40.png)

apps.name: v1.0.5 Release (Streamer-tvOS.ipa)
apps.versionDescription:
- Fix 123movies URL loading for "Vidembed.me" domain caused an error when trying to play any new TV show or movie. 
- Add new sources in the settings of the app for AppleTV and iOS. Make sure to restart the app after changing the selection
  - **Flixtor.video**: Not updated regularly like 123movies but provide better quality and contains many subtitles for different languages. Chromecast support is not working for now for this provider.
  - **Yesmovies.ag**: This provider is updated regularly and has some 1080p movies, but it doesn't have any subtitles. Search is not working for now as there is DDoS protection. 
  - **Akwam.io**: Arabic experimental provider for my pleasure
- New Subtitle selector for tvOS. Try it out with Flixtor provider 
- Fix backdrop image for movies and TvShows 
- Remove Topshelf support for tvOS as it was causing trouble in certificate signing.
![Simulator Screen Shot - iPhone 13 - 2022-01-16 at 22 45 08](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/96978272/149679309-4973bce9-935a-42ea-8a48-a93b99453403.png)

![Simulator Screen Shot - Apple TV - 2022-01-16 at 22 10 12](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/96978272/149679325-7014fedc-d36e-455e-b1f7-07f825b43a40.png)
